title: Establishes an independent citizens education finance review committee
summary: Establishes an independent citizens education finance review committee within the education department to monitor and report on the provision of and state assistance provided to public education in this state, so as to ensure that a quality education is provided to all students in the state.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a citizens education finance review committee to ensure that equity in the provision of state assistance to school districts is achieved
